IT CHANGED MY LIFE BEST MOVIE EVER 12/10

One of the worst movies I have ever seen. The plot was fast-moving, but felt rushed rather than engaging. They included a lot of unnecessary dialogue that was seemingly meant to be funny, but the only part of the entire film that was even remotely funny was how bad the entire movie was. Whenever the characters Jailbreak and Gene were together I could literally hear some members of the audience facepalming (myself included). The movie was horrible and the only reason I give it half a star was because it was entertaining in how bad it was. I do not recommend seeing it or you'll just find yourself walking out of the theater before the movie ends, as many did when I saw it.
This could have been a good movie, but it was not. It had terrible writing and way to much ad placement. The only good part of this film was the animation.

I saw it, it was visually beautiful with fluid animation and semi okay character design. The story was predictably boring with subplots to pad out time and with shallow jokes. Some people might enjoy this, but I found myself snoring.
